alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:53PM MST until June 23 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 353 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Laveen, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Avondale, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Laveen, Piestewa Peak Park, South Phoenix, Arizona State Fairgrounds, South Mountain Park, Phoenix International Raceway, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Glendale, Camelback Mountain and Sky Harbor Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 133 and 151. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 207. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
